value:
If everyone could be silent and
listen to their inner voice, they
could understand so much...$k$pWhat is so hard to comprehend
about that?

Indeed, my grandfather is Manfroy,
the great priest of Loptr. I'd rather
not speak of him.

You're tired, aren't you? There's
no deceiving me. Come, rest your
head. I will watch over you.

*sigh* You're not doing much to help
with my boredom. Let's go for a walk.
You need a break too!

Being here, I hear so many voices...
Beautiful voices, hesitant voices, all
kinds of voices. I really enjoy it!

I was told to follow the sound of a
beautiful voice, and here you are,
$Nu!

I hear the voice, and I understand
everything. I'm ready to go!

I can't quite make out what
the voice is saying...
*sigh*
Well, isn't this fun? Thank you!

My name is Sara...and I know just
who you are. Hee-hee. Very well,
I'll do what I can to help.

It's good that I came here. There's
something fun around every corner.
Being minded by scolds was so dull...$k$pHere, there are many people from
many worlds, and the jumble of their
voices is so pleasant.$k$pYour voice, though, is the clearest of
all. It rings through the cacophony...
not as a single voice, but as a chorus.$k$pHow mysterious, and so beautiful. I
get the feeling that as long as I am
with you, I will never be bored.$k$pI think we should have fun together
for a long time to come! As long as
you need me, here I am!
えいっ
Bye bye
きゃあっ！
That hurts...
Who are you supposed to be?
This is my decision!
A voice calls to me...
Get out of my way.
I'm so lonely...
Hehe
I'll help you.
Get it together.
I'm Sara. I know all there is to know about you.
My mother and father are dead. They say my grandfather murdered my father.
I do not wish to speak of my grandfather. I despise that man.
Aagh! This is so boring. Can I go for a walk?
You were the one calling out to me, weren't you? I like your voice.
Why not?
What?
Let's go.
